vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, only mentioned at Gen.10.28;
son of: Joktan (H3355);
brother of: Almodad (H0486), Sheleph (H8026), Hazarmaveth (H2700), Jerah (H3392), Hadoram (H1913A), Uzal (H0187), Diklah (H1853), Abimael (H0039), Sheba (H7614H), Ophir (H0211), Havilah (H2341I) and Jobab (H3103)
Also named: e.val (עֵיבָל "Obal" H5858A)
§ Obal = "stripped bare"
a son of Joktan and the founder of an Arab tribe
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Joctán; descendiente de Sem
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
俄巴路 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "條帶狀的裸露"
約坍的一個兒子, 一個阿拉伯部落的始祖 {#創 10:28|}
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
俄巴路 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "条带状的裸露"
约坍的一个儿子, 一个阿拉伯部落的始祖 {#创 10:28|}
